activities.name: Execute Copy For All Records From ECDC
Copy ECDC data from http to ADLS_copy1
Data flow to transform cases and deaths

scriptLines: select1 split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admission per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
new_hospital_occupency_count = {Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_ count},
new_icu_occupency_count = {Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_ count},
